frame.name: DinoRun
frame.subtitle: Endless Runner Game
frame.description: Play DinoRun - an exciting endless runner game where you control a dinosaur jumping over obstacles. Try to get the highest score and share it with friends on Farcaster!
frame.tagline: Jump, boost, and survive in this thrilling endless runner!
frame.ogTitle: DinoRun - Endless Runner Game on Farcaster
frame.ogDescription: Play DinoRun - an exciting endless runner game where you control a dinosaur jumping over obstacles. Try to get the highest score!
